Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Miracle Grass^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
I am in need of 3 ^orange;Miracle Grass^reset; seeds to try a new regeneration experiment. You'll find them at your ^orange;Gene Design Lab^reset;. Can you fetch me some?
Thanks, now I can complete this research project and wow the investors! ^green;I'll send replacement seeds^reset; later.
